data.title: Current Career Opportunities
data.meta_description: Search for open positions at the Arizona Department of Child Safety
data.text:
Thanks for visiting, we’re glad you are considering joining our team at the Arizona Department of Child Safety.

As you are considering applying for one of our open positions, we encourage you to also review the robust benefits package offered by the State of Arizona.

You can learn more about our team and the values that guide our work here.

We know you will find the work in strengthening Arizona’s families to be highly rewarding. We look forward to receiving and reviewing your online application.
